rendezvous_2026_paid.subject: Registration now open for 2026 MGA Rendezvous
rendezvous_2026_paid.intro: We are pleased to announce that registration is now open for the MGA Rendezvous, taking place on 11-12 May 2026 at the {hotelLink}Hotel Arts{/hotelLink} in Barcelona.
rendezvous_2026_paid.description: FASE's annual conference, the MGA Rendezvous, provides a truly pan-European forum bringing together MGAs, capacity providers, and selected service partners. The conference will include significant opportunities for structured networking and relationship-building as well as a world-class speaker programme.
rendezvous_2026_paid.member_benefit: Rendezvous passes are half price for FASE members. We also have a limited block of rooms at a discounted rate at the Hotel Arts, which we can share with you as soon as you have registered.
rendezvous_2026_paid.cta: For further information and to register for the conference, please visit {rendezvousLink}mgarendezvous.com{/rendezvousLink}.
rendezvous_2026_paid.closing: We hope to see you in Barcelona.
